âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ macOS installation on Proxmox VE â€¢ Supports AMD and Intel hardware â€¢ Supports multiple macOS versions (High Sierra to Sequoia) â€¢ Supports Proxmox VE versions 7.x to 8.4.x
ðŸ“– Summary: The OSX-PROXMOX repository provides a streamlined method for installing macOS on Proxmox VE, supporting both AMD and Intel hardware. It simplifies the virtualization process, enabling users to run various macOS versions from High Sierra to Sequoia on Proxmox. The repository also offers cloud support and integrates OpenCore for enhanced compatibility and security.
